title: San Diego/Point Loma-Ocean Beach
name: Fort Rosecrans
content: A former WWII military outpost, situated on Point Loma to protect the Naval Base on Coronado from attack by sea. The fort contains bunkers, weapons emplacements and the '''[http://www.cem.va.gov/CEM/cems/nchp/ftrosecrans.asp Fort Rosecrans National Cemetery]''', which holds a number of monuments including the USS Bennington Monument. An exhibit in Cabrillo National Monument displays some of the history of Fort Rosecrans.
